article_title: Republicans question costs of Obama student-loan relief
article_text:
THE WALL STREET JOURNAL — A key Senate Republican criticized the White House on Monday for suggesting a new plan to lower Americans’ student-debt payments would carry no costs, saying the plan would increase the deficit.

“There most likely is a cost and the president shouldn’t propose it without telling us a cost,” said Sen. Lamar Alexander of Tennessee, the top Republican on the Senate committee overseeing education policy.

Read more at The Wall Street Journal.
